name: Del Norte Tennis and Pickleball Association
description: Del Norte Tennis and Pickleball Association is one of the most popular places to play pickleball in Crescent City, CA. There are 4 indoor acrylic courts. These are dedicated courts with permanent lines and nets. The facility includes amenities like lights, water, and restrooms. A membership is required to play.
fees: Members only â€” Annual membership (Eleven months) $175

name: Peterson Park
description: Come play pickleball at Peterson Park in Crescent City, CA! There are 4 outdoor hard courts. The lines are permanent, but you'll need to bring your own net. The courts are free.

name: Village Camper Inn Rv Park
description: Village Camper Inn Rv Park is one of the most popular places to play pickleball in Crescent City, CA. There is 1 outdoor court. This is a dedicated court with a permanent net and lines. The court is private.
